name: VirtualTrump
0:
”Alexa, launch Virtual Trump”
”Alexa, start Virtual Trump”
”Alexa, open Virtual Trump”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual trump
des: Have a virtual conversation with Donald Trump! This skill uses Donald Trump's actual voice to create a simulated conversation with Donald Trump. It's so incoherent and illogical, you'll think you're talking to the actual Donald Trump! Just start the skill to begin.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
